title: Fragment From A Garment, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spn wools.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: A figure within a circle in the cente of the square. A duck at each corner of the outer border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment From A Garment, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spn wools.
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-40.
